content.title: When you separated
content.info1: You need to provide the following dates related to your separation. The court will use the most recent date as the date that you separated.
content.info2: Use the same date for both if they happened on the same day. If you're not sure of the exact dates, use the closest dates that you remember.

question1.text: When did you first decide that the marriage was over?

question2.text: When did you start living apart?
question2.info: You can both live in the same property and be considered by the court to be living apart, as long as you're living separate lives. For example, you donâ€™t eat, sleep, or socialise together.
